name: HIVEMIND (wojtaj, Tygrak, lonnie)
description:
Combination of strategy and bullet hell game. Sort of.

Try to stay alive and collect pearls.

Eggs replenish your hive.

If you are getting game over screens, try keeping your hive more together.

Controls:

WASD- move

Space - explode hive

Ctrl - recall biting hivers

Authors:

lonnie - 3D art, music, game design

Tygrak - music, programming, 2D art

wojtaj - programming, game design

Assets used:

https://www.dafont.com/beer-goggles.font?text=NEW+GAME&l[]=10&l[]=1&back=theme
